testsuite.name: ru.netology.diploma.test.BuyingTourTest

testcase.name: Successful purchase of a tour with payment on credit with valid APPROVED card.
Error occurred when submitting a completed form with invalid CVC/CVV data.
Receiving an error when filling out the card payment form with expired card data.
The bank's refusal to purchase a tour using a debit card when filling out the form with valid DECLINED card data.

testcase.name: Getting an error when submitting a form with letters in the card number.
The bank's refusal to purchase a tour using a debit card when filling out the form with card data that is not registered in the system
Purchase of a tour when filling out the form with valid debit card data APPROVED
The bank's refusal to purchase a tour on credit when filling out the form with card data that is not registered in the system.
Error when buying a tour with invalid cardholder data on the form.

testcase.name: Receiving an error when sending an empty application form for the purchase of a tour.
The bank's refusal to purchase a tour on credit when filling out the form with valid DECLINED card data.
